data.actual_result: The ping doesn't and you have to mark it as read on  the overlay
data.expected_result: The ping doesn't appear and syncs with desktop
data.short_description: Pings that are marked as read on desktop don't sync with the overlay
data.steps_to_repro: - Ensure the overlay is running (doesn't have to be visible) - Get a ping in a channel - Read the ping on the desktop client - Observe the ping on the overlay
